code:
[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input  logic clk,           // Clock signal
    input  logic areset,        // Asynchronous reset, active high
    input  logic load,          // Synchronous load signal, active high
    input  logic ena,           // Synchronous enable signal, active high
    input  logic [3:0] data,    // 4-bit data input
    output logic [3:0] q        // 4-bit shift register output
);

always_ff @(posedge clk or posedge areset) begin
    if (areset) begin
        q <= 4'b0000;
    end else if (load) begin
        q <= data;
    end else if (ena) begin
        q <= {1'b0, q[3:1]}; // Perform right shift with zero fill
    end
end

endmodule
```
[DONE]

iterations.code:
module TopModule (
    input  wire clk,           // Clock signal
    input  wire areset,        // Asynchronous reset, active high
    input  wire load,          // Synchronous load signal, active high
    input  wire ena,           // Synchronous enable signal, active high
    input  wire [3:0] data,    // 4-bit data input
    output reg  [3:0] q        // 4-bit shift register output
);

always @(posedge clk or posedge areset) begin
    if (areset) begin
        q <= 4'b0000;
    end else if (load) begin
        q <= data;
    end else if (ena) begin
        q <= {1'b0, q[3:1]}; // Perform right shift with zero fill
    end
    // No else block needed for default behavior as q retains its value
end

endmodule
